name: Pyukumuku
author: You Iribi
flavor_text: It lives in shallow seas, such as areas near a beach. It can eject its internal organs, which it uses to engulf its prey or battle enemies.

abilities.name: Innards Out
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent’s attack, put 6 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Continuous Tumble
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage for each heads.
